summary: "Dandy Don" Meredith  was an American football player.
full_text:
Mount Vernon is a town in Franklin County, Texas, United States. It is the Franklin County seat, and the population was 2,662
at the 2010 census.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31.
title: Mount Vernon, Texas
